name: react-devtools-electron
description: Add React DevTools to your Electron app
author: Dimitar Nestorov <opensource@dimitarnestorov.com> (https://dimitarnestorov.com)

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run clear && yarn run build && yarn run check-extension-version && yarn run copy-readme
scripts.build-extension: yarn --cwd ../vendor install && yarn --cwd ../vendor build-for-devtools && yarn --cwd ../vendor workspace react-devtools-extensions build:chrome
scripts.build: yarn run build-extension && yarn run copy-extension-build && tsc
